options.content:
See the [KubeArchive SLO dashboard](/d/beqtfn88x35kwd/kubearchive-slos)

*This dashboard may show incorrect results due to changes
required in the o11y side from Konflux. Don't trust what
you see here and go to the Grafana instance in each of the
cluster*

This dashboard is meant to be used with one cluster
at a time. Please select a single cluster from
the Cluster dropdown just above this text. Check
[Eran's aggregator page](https://eisraeli.pages.redhat.com/rhtap-link/#konflux-clusters)
for links of all the clusters.

panels.title: % usage of memory on the namespace
Number of read responses during period
Average of read latency during period (non 500)

targets.expr: sum by (source_cluster) (increase(http_server_request_duration_count{http_route!~"(/livez|/readyz)", exported_job="kubearchive.api", http_status_code="500"}[$__range])) / sum by (source_cluster) (increase(http_server_request_duration_count{http_route!~"(/livez|/readyz)", exported_job="kubearchive.api"}[$__range]))

panels.title: Number of 500 read responses during period
Received resource updates in the last 24 hours
Number of accepted resources during period
Average of ingestion latency during period

list.description: Choose a source cluster for the metrics shown
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cluster
